line_1: With whom, dismissing forms, he may unbend,
line_2: But wisely seeks a more convenient friend,

line_1: With whom your bounding hearts unbend;
line_2: Then hither bring the early friend,

line_1: To warn, and teach him safely to unbend,
line_2: Ev'n in his pastimes he requires a friend

line_1: Thy Mind one Moment to unbend;
